title: Lv 5 user played rank game in our team
body:
Hi i just played a rank game and noticed that one of my team member was lv 5 unrank user.
I did double check his stat through op.gg and it clearly states that he is level 5. 
We had to surrender game within 15mins due to this bug.
I captured a photo of his profile. Please reach me I will send you a copy of image to investigate.
this shouldn't happen under no circumstance.

replies.body: It's highly unlikely the player was actually level 5. I would say it's likely the summoner name got taken from an inactive level 5 account by a new (and now level 30+) account, but because the backend hasn't updated properly you are stilling seeing the stats from the account that had the name previously.
